com.bigdata.service.geospatial

Interface GeoSpatial


  • public interface GeoSpatial

    A vocabulary for geospatial extension querying, designed to operate over the default index configuration (lat, lon, time).

    Example: find all points in the rectangle spanned from (0.00001, 0.00002) to (0.00003, 0.00003) with times between 1-3s. 

       PREFIX geo: 
   SELECT ?res WHERE {
     ?res geo:search "inRectangle" .
     ?res geo:predicate  .
     ?res geo:spatialRectangleSouthWest "0.00001#0.00002" .
     ?res geo:spatialRectangleNorthEast "0.00003#0.00003" .
     ?res geo:timeStart "1" .
     ?res geo:timeEnd "3" .
   }
    or Example: find all points in a 0.1 km circle around point (0.00002,0.00002) with times between 1-3s. 
       PREFIX geo: 
   SELECT ?res WHERE {
     ?res geo:search "inCircle" .
     ?res geo:predicate  .
     ?res geo:spatialCircleCenter "0.00002#0.00002" .
     ?res geo:spatialCircleRadius "0.1" .
     ?res geo:timeStart "1" .
     ?res geo:timeEnd "3" .
   }
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Michael Schmidt

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  GeoSpatial.GeoFunction
      Enum for implemented geo functions.
      static interface  GeoSpatial.Options 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.openrdf.model.URI CONTEXT
      Pointer to the context used in scanned triples.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI DATATYPE
      The datatype to be used for GeoSpatial literals.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI LOCATION_AND_TIME_VALUE
      Output variable; if set, this variable is bound to a combined representation of the locations + time component of the search result.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI LOCATION_VALUE
      Output variable; if set, this variable is bound to the locations component of the search result.
      static String NAMESPACE
      The namespace used for magic search predicates.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI PREDICATE
      Pointer to the predicate used in scanned triples.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI SEARCH
      The name of the search function, pointing to a GeoSpatial.GeoFunction.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI SPATIAL_CIRCLE_CENTER
      In case of a GeoSpatial.GeoFunction.IN_CIRCLE query only: center point of the bounding circle.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI SPATIAL_CIRCLE_RADIUS
      In case of a GeoSpatial.GeoFunction.IN_CIRCLE query only: radius of the bounding circle, specified in SPATIAL_UNIT.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI SPATIAL_RECTANGLE_NORTH_EAST
      In case of a GeoSpatial.GeoFunction.IN_RECTANGLE query only: north east border point of the bounding rectangle.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI SPATIAL_RECTANGLE_SOUTH_WEST
      In case of a GeoSpatial.GeoFunction.IN_RECTANGLE query only: south west border point of the bounding rectangle.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI SPATIAL_UNIT
      The spatial unit used for distances specified in the geospatial search request.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI TIME_END
      End time of the time interval to scan for.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI TIME_START
      Start time of the time interval to scan for.
      static org.openrdf.model.URI TIME_VALUE
      Output variable; if set, this variable is bound to the time component of the search result.
